title: Who are some similar authors to Matthew Reilly, James Rollin? - Quora

response.answer_text: Noting from your description, I see that you're already familiar with Ludlum's work. Anyway, I'd suggest that you give these authors a try: Lee Child: Lee Child is perhaps best known as the creator of the character Jack Reacher and in case you are not familiar with his work, I'd suggest that you begin with his debut novel titled “Killing Floor.”Jo Nesbo : Don't know much about him but I'd suggest you give him a try. You can start by reading his novel titled “Headhunter.”Try Michael Crichton too, the creator of the hit novel Jurrasic Park which was developed into a Major Motion Picture.You can also give Robin Cook a try if you are into Medical Thrillers.I'd also recommend that you give the “Artemis Fowl” series a try. It's author is Eoin Colfer and the central character in this series is a young teenage boy who happens to be the smartest criminal on the planet. A must read if you were to ask me. That's all I can come up with for now. Thanks for the A2A btw.

A little research turned up these names: - Rebecca Cantrell- Grant Blackwood- Steve Berry- James Patterson- J.A. Konrath- Barry Eisler- Jeremy Robinson- Rick Riordan (he writes for adults as well as kids) Out of personal experience, I can recommend: - Edgar Rice Burroughs- Jules Verne- H.G. Wells
